BuzzFeedQuiz What type of music do you listen to? Punk Rock Country Pop R and B Hip Hop EDM
What is your chosen aesthetic? 70\'s Hippie Emo Grandpa Cottage Core Skater Little Boy
How would your friends describe you? Idealist Conspiracist Pessimist Nihilist Optimist Realist
What is your favorite day of the week? Tuesday Wednesday Friday Monday Thursday Saturday and Sunday
Pick a place to live: Beach Forest Suburbs Mountains Desert
Pick a leisurely activity: Writing Reading Painting Skating Crafting Gaming
What is your favorite color? Red Orange Yellow Green Blue Purple
What type of movies do you watch? Rom-Com Coming-of-Age Documentaries Animated I don\'t watch movies Horror
What is your favorite number? 1
Analyze
Indie Metal
Do you like to listen to different types of music? Yes No Only if it is good8 What is your chosen form of dancing? Swaying Moshing Toe-Tapping Breakdancing Waltz Aggressive Hand Movement
Pick a time period: 1970\'s 2000\'s 1990\'s 2020\'s 2010\'s 1980\'s
What determines if you like a song? The Beat The Singer\'s Voice The Song\'s Vibe The Lyrics The Guitar If You Can Dance
When you want to hear new music, where you headed? Festivals Raves Concerts Coffee Shops Radio Local Record Store
Pick a movie snack: Popcorn Gummy Bears Chocolate Peanuts Ice Cream None
When are you going to watch a movie? When Someone Makes Me At Red Carpet Premier When it\'s on Netflix When it\'s in Theaters When it\'s on Redbox On Opening Night
Pick a famous movie franchise: Dune Hunger Games Lord of the Rings Harry Potter Star Wars Twilight
How committed to movies are you? Owns House Decor Enjoys it Knows Everything Costume Premiers Doesn\'t Care Forgets Entire Plot
Pick a comfort movie: Princess Diaries Sweet Magnolias Avengers King Kong Top Gun Coco
Who is your favorite actress/actor George Clooney Johnny Depp Anne Hathaway Meryl Streep Angelina Jolie Ryan Reynolds
How do you feel about musicals? HATE Don\'t Care LOVE Depends on the Musical
How many movies do you watch in a week?
Your Personality is: Red!!! This means that you are an emotionally driven person. Who will on most occasions will make decisions with your heart instead of your head.
Your Personality is: Orange!!! This means that you are a person who is always driven by emotion but also tries to see the good of the situation. You bring joy to people through content easy-going personality.
Your Personality is: Yellow!!! This means that you an optimistic person who never fails to see the silver lining. You always bring sunshine and joy to the people around you.
Your Personality is: Green!!! This means that you are a person who values the little things in life. You may not always appear to be a ray of sunshine, but you always appreciate the beauty of life.
Your Personality is: Blue!!! This means that you are a rather mellow person. Who always just goes with the flow and is calm, cool, and collected.
Your Personality is: Purple!!! This means that you are a person who on the surface appears bright and bubbly, but in actuality you are just content. Living life as it goes and appreciates it as it is.
The Music I\'d Play For You is: Saint Motel!!! The specific song that I would play for you is Sweet Talk. This is because you appreciate indie music, and love music to just vibe.
The Music I\'d Play For You is: A Day to Remember!!! The specific song that I would play for you is 2nd Sucks. This is because you appreciate punk music and love music because of the iconic punk rock guitar and head banging drops.
The Music I\'d Play For You is: Alicia Keys!!! The specific song that I would play for you is Diary. This is because you appreciate mellow toe-tapping R and B music, with a beautiful voice singing the deeper meaning lyrics.
The Music I\'d Play For You is: Illinium!!! The specific song that I would play for you is Fragments. This is because you appreciate music for reasons deeper than lyrics, it's all about the instruments and the crazy beat and drops.
The Music I\'d Play For You is: Issac Dunbar!!! The specific song that I would play for you is Scorton\'s Creek. This is because you like listening to different types of music that just makes you feel something.
The Music I\'d Play For You is: Friday Pilots Club!!! The specific song that I would play for you is The End of It. This is because you appreciate pop music that is absolutely danceable. Music brings you joy and you just want to dance and bop.
The Movie I\'d Play For You is: 5 Feet Apart!!! This means that you
The Movie I\'d Play For You is: Batman The Dark Knight Rises!!! This means that you
